mapper.select: select d.did, d.dname, d.dage, d.dphone, d.daddress, d.dplace, d.idNumber, d.driveId, d.stage, u.name as createBy from driver d join user u on u.id = d.createBy where did=#{did}
select * from driver order by driveId desc limit #{skipCount} , #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into driver( did, dname, dage, dphone, daddress, dplace, idNumber, driveId, stage, createBy ) values( #{did}, #{dname}, #{dage}, #{dphone}, #{daddress}, #{dplace}, #{idNumber}, #{driveId}, #{stage}, #{createBy} )
